text: inna l-mus'limina wal-mus'limati wal-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wal-qanitina wal-qanitati wal-sadiqina wal-sadiqati wal-sabirina wal-sabirati wal-khashi平ina wal-khashi平ati wal-mutasadiqina wal-mutasadiqati wal-saimina wal-saimati wal-hafizina furujahum wal-hafizati wal-dhakirina l-laha kathiran wal-dhakirati a平adda l-lahu lahum maghfiratan wa-ajran 平aziman
